column2: English
Training
ALPHA REPORTING. THE ROAD BLOCK IS CLEARED. SEND US THE ENGINEERS TO CLEAR THIS PLACE UP. ALPHA OUT.
ENGINEERS ARE HERE. WE CONTINUE TO THE HILL. ALPHA OUT.
ALPHA TO PAPABEAR. THE HILL IS CLEARED. WE GOT THE HILL. OVER.
PAPABEAR THIS IS ALPHA. WE GOT ENEMY SNIPER ON THE HILL SOUTH FROM OUT POSIT. I REPEAT ENEMY SNIPER SIGHTED DUE SOUTH. TAKING CASUALTIES, REQUESTING IMMEDIATE ASSISTANCE. OVER.
THIS IS ALPHA. SEEMS THAT WE HAVE WIPED OUT THE RUSSIANS FROM THIS HILL. OVER.

ROGER CHARLIE. YOUR TARGET IS THE SOUTH-WEST FOREST EDGE OF GAMMA HOTEL SIX SIX, I REPEAT GAMMA HOTEL SIX SIX. TARGET IS ABOUT 20 METERS WEST FROM THE FOREST EDGE. NO FRIENDLIES IN THAT HILL. YOU ARE FREE TO ENGAGE. ALPHA OUT.
ALPHA BLACK CONFIRMS YOUR ORDNANCE IS DUMB BOMBS. JUST DROP EVERYTHING YOU GOT. OVER.
FUCKING AWESOME JOB CHARLIE BLACK. REMIND ME TO BUY YOU GUYS A BEER LATERON. ALPHA OUT.
PAPABEAR TO ALPHA. GOOD WORK, SECURE THE AREA AND WAIT FOR THE ENGINEERS. OVER.
ROGER ALPHA. RADIO IN WHEN THE HILL IS SECURE. OVER.
GOOD JOB ALPHA.
ROGER ALPHA. WE ARE DISPATCHING AIR SUPPORT TO YOUR LOCATION. KEEP LOW AND OUT OF SIGHT. PAPABEAR OUT.
GOOD WORK ALPHA. WE KNOWLEDGE YOU HAVE CLEANED THE HILL. PAPABEAR OUT.
ALPHA BLACK THIS IS CHARLIE. REQUESTING FURTHER TARGET COORDINATES. OVER.
BE NOTICED THAT OUR ORDNANCE IS 2000LBS DUMB BOMBS. THE TARGET IS DANGER CLOSE. I REPEAT MAKE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND OUR ORDNANCE IS DUMB BOMBS. PLEASE CONFIRM ALPHA BLACK. OVER.
COPY ALPHA. ENGAGING, HOLD TIGHT. CHARLIE OUT.
BOMBS AWAY!
HEHE YOU CAN COUNT ON THAT ALPHA BLACK. CHARLIE OUT.
